properties.entry: SELECT HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , WRITING_DATE , MEMBER_ID FROM HOTEL H JOIN RESERVATION RV USING (RESERVATION_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY WRITING_DATE DESC

SELECT HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , D_NUMBER , WRITING_DATE /* 작성일자 */ , RESERVATION_DATE /* 예약일자 */ , MEMBER_ID , DOG_SIZE FROM HOTEL H JOIN RESERVATION RV USING (RESERVATION_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN DOG D USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE HOTEL_NO = ? AND HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y'
